title: Thunderbird Add-Ons
creator: tardis1
content:
Hello,

Thanks for bringing Thunderbird for Android.

We have developed a Thunderbird AddOn, which works successfully on Windows, Linux and Mac Thunderbird Desktop programs. It would be wonderful to be able to use it on Android as well. I haven't seen any possibility to install an AddOn from a file (or from https://addons.thunderbird.net/). Am I missing something or is this not yet possible ? This seems possible with Firefox for Android, at least from the store and for some addons (https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1431645).

Also, it looks like HTML signatures aren't usable as they are in the Desktop program. This would be a nice addition, and probably less complicated.

Thanks in advance for your help.

title: Unified inbox not showing all emails on Android
creator: spartanhooah
content: On Android, I currently have two emails in my Gmail inbox that aren't showing up in the unified inbox. This isn't consistent - most emails go to the unified inbox, but not all. I haven't been able to figure out a pattern.

title: installation of thunderbird on Samsung Galaxy S24 phone
creator: pel1
content: After export of thunderbird from desktop to Android Phone I get no access to inbox
